title: I have this really visceral image in my head
body:
Of getting punched in the mouth and i can feel the hair on the guy's knuckles as he belts me

and my right front tooth is chipped, so it's like 60% fake ceramic stuff and i can actually feel it shattering with some of the fragments going into my lip, the rest kind of hitting my tongue and for a moment it's all just kind of like

wow

shock

ow

i got hit

wow

and then blood starts running from my mouth and i can taste it, along with a slight hint of fake tooth ceramicy dentist powder and the pain comes soon after


and i dont know where or why i got it, but its there and mildly distressing

hi
